plot: The story of a young girl taking a cross-country road trip to surprise a childhood friend. But it is the events that happen along the way that force her to dig up her past and wrench her mind to uncover a memory she buried a long time ago.
title: Pause
plot_es: The story of a young girl taking a cross-country road trip to surprise a childhood friend. But it is the events that happen along the way that force her to dig up her past and wrench her mind to uncover a memory she buried a long time ago.
